Change.After: 144/216/288/360/432 (+135% AP) (Note: Including the damage upon rooting an enemy, this totals to 164/246/328/411/492 (+215% AP))
Spells now also trigger the attack speed when used to damage enemies under 50% Health. The attack speed granted by attacks and spells now linger between attacks.

Change.Before: Ticks twice as fast while no one is hunted
Change.After: Refunds 30% if no one is found by the active
No longer locks out casting while in champion combat

Change.Attribute: Auto attack lockout after casting E2:

Change.After: Claws in FrontNow only latches onto champions in front of Warwick

Change.Attribute: Defiance Secondary Target Bonus Movement Speed Duration:

Change.After: Ornn can now upgrade all (minus a few exceptions like Mejai's Soulstealer, Archangel's Staff, and similar items) Legendary items to Masterwork items.
Masterwork Items gain extra stats based on the stats the original Legendary item provides. (If an item gives AD and HP, the upgrade will give you more AD and HP etc.)

Change.After: 6-48 (based on level) (+2% AP per 100 bonus health) (+4% of his bonus health)
Shaco’s Jack in the Boxes are no longer one-shot by Grubs.
Shaco’s clone now creates an orange poof when it snaps back to Shaco or teleports for any reason.
Shaco’s clone duration is now displayed on the HUD.
Shaco’s clone no longer loses its auto attack target when casting spells.
Viktor's Q empowered auto attack now applies to towers.
now matches Kog'Maw's auto attack frame time

E now silences enemies in the area instantly rather than after a variable delay.

Change.After: 35 (+10 per 5 Chimes) (+40% AP) Bonus Magic Damage

Change.After: 75-160 (based on level) (+1-11% target’s maximum health) (progression is now linear)
